author: thomreis
body:
#### PR description:

Switches off the online ECAL RecHit GPU vs. CPU comparisons since the RecHit module is identical in both options.
Until PR https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/39373 is merged the collections are still consumed so the same existing RecHit collection is used for CPU and GPU inputs.

#### PR validation:

Configured and ran cmsRun with the configuration but no events were processed since the source is a stream that was not available. Should be tested on the playback system as well.

Backport of #39393
title: ECAL - Switch off online ECAL RecHit GPU vs. CPU monitoring - 12_4_X
